org.genepattern.io
Interface DatasetWriter

All Known Implementing Classes:
CnWriter, GctWriter, LohWriter, MAGEMLWriter, OdfDatasetWriter, ResWriter, SnpWriter, StanfordTxtWriter, XcnWriter
public interface DatasetWriter

Interface for dataset writers.
